Title: Korra Alone
Writer: Michael Dante DiMartino (created by), Michael Dante DiMartino, Bryan Konietzko (created by)
Actors: Janet Varney, David Faustino, Seychelle Gabriel, P.J. Byrne
Plot: While Korra is struggling with PTSD by the metal poison Zaheer injected in her, she sets off on a journey to try to connect with Raava. Amidst all of this, Tenzin and the others realize that Korra has gone missing after 6 months.
